區.definition: area; region; district; small; distinguish; CL:個|个[ge4]

區位.definition: geographical location; (computing) row-cell (i.e. the row 區|区[qu1] and cell 位[wei4] used to specify a character in a CJK character set)

區分.definition: to differentiate; to draw a distinction; to divide into categories

區分大小寫.definition: case sensitive; distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters

區別.definition: difference; to distinguish; to discriminate; to make a distinction; CL:個|个[ge4]

區處.definition: (literary) dwelling; residence; (Tw) regional office of a company

區間.definition: delimited area; defined section of a train or bus route; numerical range; (math.) interval

區間車.definition: train or bus traveling only part of its normal route

區隔.definition: to mark off; interval; segment (e.g. of market); compartment; segmentation
